text: Peter Marcuse (November 13, 1928 â€“ March 4, 2022) was a German-born American lawyer. He was a professor emeritus of urban planning at the University of California, Los Angeles and Columbia University. Marcuse died on March 4, 2022, at the age of 93. ==Written works== * * * * ==References== ==Other websites== * Peter Marcuse's personal page at marcuse.org. * Critical planning and other thoughts Peter Marcuse's blog.
